1. 目的Purpose
為確保國立成功大學資訊與機電整合實驗室（以下簡稱本實驗室）與專案場域執行之專案（以下簡稱本專案）所屬資訊資產可用性、機密性與完整性，並符合相關法規之規範要求，使其免於遭受內、外部的蓄意或意外之威脅，並衡酌本實驗室之業務需求，有效落實專案場域之資安措施，特制定本政策以玆遵循。
To ensure the availability, confidentiality, and integrity of information assets belonging to the National Cheng Kung University Information and Mechatronics Integration Lab (hereinafter referred to as "the Lab") and the projects executed within the project field (hereinafter referred to as "the Project"), and to comply with relevant regulatory requirements, safeguarding them against intentional or unintentional internal and external threats, while considering the operational needs of the Lab, this policy is hereby established for effective implementation of cyber security measures within the project field.
2. 適用範圍Scope of Application
本實驗室所提供工業自動化與控制系統之專案場域相關人事物皆適用。
工業自動化與控制系統資訊安全標準IEC 62443-2-4中12項安全計畫(Security Programs, SP)規範事項涵蓋範圍如下：
This policy is applicable to all personnel, events, and objects related to industrial automation and control system projects provided by the Lab.
The scope of the 12 Security Program (SP) requirements in the accordance with IEC 62443-2-4 is as follows:
2.1 人員安全管理政策與執行
Personnel Safety Management Policy and Implementation
2.2 場域安全服務強化與執行
Field Security Service Strengthening and Implementation
2.3 場域安全架構設計與執行
Field Security Architecture Design and Implementation
2.4 網路通訊安全設計與執行
Network Communication Security Design and Implementation
2.5 安全儀控系統設計與執行
Safety Instruments Systems Design and Implementation
2.6 組態管理與執行
Configuration Management and Execution
2.7 遠端存取管理與執行
Remote Access Management and Execution
2.8 資訊安全事件管理與執行
Cyber Security Incident Management and Execution
2.9 帳戶管理與執行
Account Management and Execution
2.10 惡意程式防護管理與執行
Malware Protection Management and Execution
2.11 修補程式管理與執行
Patch Management and Execution
2.12 備份還原管理與執行
Backup and Restore Management and Execution
3. 權責Roles and Responsibilities
本實驗室與專案場域負責執行專案之內部人員、委外服務廠商與訪客皆應遵守本政策。
The internal personnel, outsourced service providers, and visitors of the Lab and the project field who are responsible for implementing the project shall abide by this policy.

5. 資訊安全目標The Targets of the Cyber Security
維護本實驗室所提供專案場域之資訊資產正常運作，防止資訊或資訊系統受未經授權之存取、使用、控制、洩漏、破壞、竄改、銷毀或其他侵害，並確保其資產之可用性、完整性與機密性，且所有專案團隊人員應共同努力達成下列目標：
In order to maintain the normal operation of information assets in the project field provided by the Lab, prevent information or information systems from unauthorized access, use, control, leakage, destruction, tampering, destruction or other infringements; and ensure the availability, integrity and confidentiality of their assets, all project team personnel shall work together to achieve the following goals:
5.1 保護本實驗室與專案場域資訊業務活動，避免未經授權的存取。
Protect the Lab and project field cyber operation activities to avoid unauthorized access.
5.2 保護本實驗室與專案場域資訊業務活動，避免未經授權的修改，確保其正確且完整。
Protect the Lab and project field cyber operation activities to avoid unauthorized modification, and ensure its correctness and completeness.
5.3 依照客戶對於工業自動化資訊安全要求，建立工業自動化資訊安全專案場域服務，進行專案場域風險管理，並依循IEC 62443-2-4需求項目落實品質管理循環(PDCA)精神，以持續改善工業自動化資訊安全管理系統之有效性。
According to the client's requirements for industrial automation cyber security, establish industrial automation cyber security services for the project field, conduct risk management for the project field, and follow the IEC 62443-2-4 requirements items to implement the spirit of the quality management cycle (Plan-Do-Check-Act cycle, PDCA) to continuously improve the effectiveness of the industrial automation cyber security management system.
5.4 辦理本實驗室與專案場域有關資訊安全教育訓練，提供單位學員資訊安全之意識與強化其對責任之認知。
Conduct cyber security education and training in the Lab and project field, and enhance the awareness of cyber security among department members while reinforcing their understanding of responsibilities.
5.5 本實驗室及專案場域有關工業自動化資訊安全業務活動的執行須符合法令或法規之要求。
The implementation of the industrial automation cyber security operation activities in the Lab and the project field must comply with the requirements of laws and regulations.
5.6 透過利害相關人及議題等要求事項，達成與資訊安全政策一致之預期。
Achieving alignment with cyber security policy expectations through stakeholder requirements and issues etc.
6. 責任Responsibilities 
6.1 管理階層應積極參與及支持資訊安全管理制度，並透過適當的標準和程序以實施本政策。
Managers shall actively participate in and support the cyber security management system and implement this policy through appropriate standards and procedures.
6.2 專案人員、委外廠商與專案相關之外部單位及人員均需依照相關安全管理程序以維護資訊安全政策。
Project personnel, subcontractors, and project-related external units and personnel must follow relevant security management procedures to maintain cyber security policies.
6.3 所有人員皆有責任報告資訊安全事件和任何已鑑別出之弱點。
All personnel are responsible for reporting cyber security incidents and any identified vulnerabilities.
6.4 任何危及資訊安全之行為，將視情節輕重追究其刑事、民事及行政責任，或依成功大學之相關規定進行懲處。
Any actions that endangers cyber security shall be investigated for criminal, civil, and administrative responsibilities depending on the severity of the case, or shall be punished according to the relevant regulations of NCKU.
7. 審查Review
7.1 本政策應至少每年審查一次，以反映政府法令、技術及業務等最新發展現況，並確保本校永續運作及工控資訊安全實務作業之能力。
This policy shall be reviewed at least once a year to reflect the latest developments in government laws, technology, and business, and to ensure the sustainable operation of the school and the capability of industrial automation and control system cyber security practices.
7.2 當專案團隊或專案發生重大改變時應主動進行審查。
This policy shall be actively reviewed when the project team or project undergoes significant changes.
8. 實施Implementation
本政策需經專案團隊進行查驗後實施，修正時亦同。
This policy and its revisions shall be implemented after being reviewed by the project team.

Commit to the continuous improvement of the cyber security management system.

Responsible for early warning and monitoring of cyber security status, and handling cyber security status and events.
(4) 對於存取控制管理定期進行事件紀錄檢核，以及管理程序檢核。
Regularly check the event records and management procedures for access control management.

When the personnel of the cyber security organization changes, they are responsible for updating.
(2) 制定資訊安全管理相關規範。
Formulate relevant specifications for cyber security management.
(3) 辦理資訊安全相關教育訓練及活動。
Conduct cyber security-related education, training and activities.
(4) 建立風險管理制度，執行風險管理。
Establish a risk management system and implement risk management.
(5) 建立安全事件緊急應變暨復原措施。
Establish emergency response and recovery measures for security incidents.
(6) 執行稽核改善建議事項。
Implement audit improvement recommendations.
(7) 執行預防措施之改善。
Implementation of preventive measures for improvement.
(8) 研討新資訊安全產品或技術。
Discuss new cyber security products or technologies.
(9) 執行資訊安全管理委員會決議事項。
Implement the resolutions of the Cyber Security Management Committee.
(10) 鑑別資訊安全相關之法規。
Identify laws and regulations related to cyber security.

The Cyber Security Team shall identify the requirements of relevant laws, regulations and contracts for cyber security pertaining to the cyber services provided by the Lab before holding the management review meeting every year.

Emergency Response Team: The Emergency Response Team shall be formed as a task group, comprising personnel assigned by the Lab project principal. The relevant roles and responsibilities of the members and the work content are as follows:
(1) 緊急處理組組長：
	Emergency Response Team Leader:
A. 當重大資安事件發生時，負責聯絡召集緊急處理組。
When a major cyber security event occurs, the Leader is responsible for contacting assembling the Emergency Response Team.
B. 協調及督導各關鍵業務流程負責人執行緊急處理作業，並協調資源之調派使用。
Coordinate and supervise the persons in charge of each key business process to execute emergency handling operations, and coordinate the deployment and use of resources.
C. 依據事件評估之結果，得報告上級以決議是否宣布災變及啟動業務永續運作計畫。
According to the results of the event evaluation, report to the superior to decide whether to declare a disaster and start the business continuity operation plan.
D. 當災難發生時，配合救災單位負責搶救人員、物資與設備等及現場指揮工作。
When a disaster occurs, cooperate with the disaster relief unit to be responsible for rescuing personnel, materials and equipment, etc. and on-site command work.
E. 負責災後協調指揮清理災害現場及復原工作。
Responsible for post-disaster coordination to clean up disaster sites and conduct restoration work.

Personnel responsible for each key business process:
A. 負責對資訊安全狀況進行預警、監控，及對資訊安全事件進行處置
Responsible for early warning and monitoring of cyber security status and handling of cyber security incidents.。
B. 負責召集相關人員，發展、維護、更新修訂及執行各災害復原程序。
Responsible for assembling relevant personnel and for developing, maintaining, updating, revising and implementing various disaster recovery procedures.
C. 每年負責召集相關人員進行業務永續運作計畫之測試演練。
Responsible for annually organize testing exercises for business continuity operations involving relevant personnel.
D. 負責原營運場所或異地備援場所之應變、處理、復原及運轉測試工作。
Responsible for the response, processing, restoration, and operation test of the original operating site or remote backup site.
E. 負責災害現場證據收集，俾利未來訴訟與損害求償事宜。
Responsible for the collection of evidence at the disaster site to facilitate future litigation and damage claims.
F. 災害現場評估損害狀況及執行原營運場所之現場復原工作。
Assess the damage of the disaster site and perform on-site restoration of the original operating site.

Draft the plan for an internal audit of cyber security.
(2) 執行資訊安全內部稽核。
Execute the internal audit of cyber security.

Write internal audit reports on cyber security.

Track and improve implementation of non-conformities.

Formulate a CSMS effectiveness measurement form according to the scope and objectives listed in "IMI-NCKU-A-001 Industrial Automation and Control System Cyber Security Policy" and use the measurement results as a basis to discuss each review item.

The Cyber Security Execution Team intends to establish CSMS performance indicators based on the measurement items and target levels of the CSMS effectiveness measurement form, and collect relevant data on each measurement item to evaluate the Lab's achievement of cyber security goals.

Changes in management or regulatory requirements.

Changes to contractual requirements.

Changes to acceptable risk levels or criteria.
(6) 針對資訊安全制度之需要，協調所需之資源。
Coordinate the required resources based on the needs of the cyber security system.

Improvement of control measures and effectiveness evaluation methods:

During the evaluation, items such as implementation items, required resources, responsible personnel, completion time, and result evaluation methods shall be determined to confirm the achievement of cyber security objectives.

The Lab shall inspect the measurement execution status of " IMI-NCKU-D-003 Cyber Security Management Indicators and Effectiveness Evaluation Form" every year.

If there is a need to adjust the measurement items and target levels of "IMI-NCKU-D-003 Cyber Security Management Indicators and Effectiveness Evaluation Form," discuss and improve the resolution.
5.3 組織間的合作及協調
Cooperation and Coordination among Organizations
5.3.1 為確保資訊安全事件發生時，儘速執行事件處理，須與權責或外部單位隨時保持聯繫，例如：主管機關、資通安全會報、消防單位等；並建立與組織資訊安全管理制度相關之「IMI-NCKU-D-002 外部單位聯絡清單」。
In order to ensure that when a cyber security incident occurs, the incident is handled as soon as possible, it is necessary to remain in contact with authorities and external units at all times, including the competent authority, the cyber security report, the fire department, etc.; and establish and organize an "IMI-NCKU-D-002 External Contact List" related to the cyber security management system.
5.3.2 「IMI-NCKU-D-002 外部單位聯絡清單」每年至少一次由專案經理負責維護，視組織或合約變動適時更新。
The "IMI-NCKU-D-002 External Contact List" shall be updated by the project manager at least once a year, and revised in due course depending on changes in the organization or contract.
5.3.3 應隨時與資訊安全技術相關團體維持聯繫，獲取資訊安全技術及產品資訊與知識，以及處理資訊安全事件或執行系統修補資訊等，並將資訊建立於「IMI-NCKU-D-002 外部單位聯絡清單」，由資訊安全小組負責維護更新。
Keep in touch with groups related to cyber security technology at all times to obtain information and knowledge on cyber security technology and products, as well as to deal with cyber security incidents and implement the information of system patch. The information shall be documented in "IMI-NCKU-D-002 External Contact List," which maintained and updated by the Cyber Security Team.
5.3.4 參考「IMI-NCKU-B-011 事件管理程序書」與相關權責單位建立通報管道並執行通報作業，聯繫方式應詳列於「IMI-NCKU-D-002 外部單位聯絡清單」。
Refer to "IMI-NCKU-B-011 Incident Management Process" to establish notification channels with relevant responsible units and execute notification operations. The contact information shall be listed in the "IMI-NCKU-D-002 External Contact List."

Cyber Security Target Achievement Plan and Measurement Method
5.4.1 資訊安全目標應與資訊安全政策一致並可量測，同時應考量適用之資訊安全要求，以及風險評鑑及處理之結果。並將資訊安全目標與相關事項傳達給本實驗室人員、委外廠商與資安作業相關單位，且於定期或組之重大變更時進行更新。
Cyber security objectives shall be consistent with the cyber security policy and must be measurable. At the same time, the applicable cyber security requirements and the results of risk assessment and treatment shall be taken into consideration. Cyber security goals and related matters shall be communicated to the Lab's personnel, outsourced vendors, and cyber security operation related units, and the goals shall be updated regularly or when there are major changes in the organization.
5.4.2 應定期規劃達成資訊安全目標作業，應包含：
The operation to achieve cyber security objectives shall be regularly planned and shall include:
(1) 相關執行活動或事項。
Relevant implementation activities or items.
(2) 所需投入之人員、預算、設備技術與程序表單等資源。
Required resources such as personnel, budget, equipment technology, and procedure lists.
(3) 活動或事項負責人員。
Personnel responsible for the activities or items.
(4) 活動或事項預計完成時間。
Estimated completion time of activities or items.
(5) 管理目標是否達成之評估方式。
Evaluation method of whether management objectives were achieved

The operation plan for achieving the aforementioned cyber security objectives shall be developed and documented in "IMI-NCKU-D-003 Cyber Security Management Indicators and Effectiveness Evaluation Form," which shall be maintained and updated by the Cyber Security Team.
5.5 專案管理的資訊安全
Cyber Security for Project Management
5.5.1 無論任何型態的專案，於需求說明書或契約書中，應對資訊安全加以陳述。
In any type of project, cyber security shall be addressed in the requirements specification or contract document.
5.5.2 專案啟始時應執行風險評鑑，以評估專案實施階段可能發生的資訊安全風險。
Risk assessment shall be carried out at the beginning of the project to assess the cyber security risks that may occur during the project implementation stage.
5.5.3 資訊安全專案管理之運作應依據專案管理五階段：啟始(Initiating)、規劃(Planning)、執行(Executing)、監控(Monitoring)和結束(Closing)，將資訊安全管理制度規範納入該專案的每一個階段進行控管。
Operation of cyber security project management shall be based on five phases of project management: Initiating, Planning, Executing, Monitoring, and Closing, and cyber security management system rules shall be included in the project controls at every stage of the Project.
5.5.4 專案管理應對專案相關人員進行角色界定與責任配置。
Project management shall define the roles and assign responsibilities of project-related personnel.
5.6 行動裝置及遠距工作
Mobile Devices and Remote Working
5.6.1 私人之行動裝置連結本實驗室無線網路，應有正常登錄程序。
There shall be a normal login procedure for personal mobile devices to connect to the Lab's wireless network.
5.6.2 公務之行動裝置不得破解或越獄，程式應於合法官方管道下載。
School-issued mobile devices must not be cracked or jailbroken, and programs shall be downloaded from legitimate official channels.
5.6.3 勿於公務之行動裝置隨意點選社群網站或即時通訊軟體中之超連結。
Do not randomly click on hyperlinks in social networking sites or instant messaging software when using official mobile devices.
5.6.4 未經單位網路管理人員授權許可，禁止執行網路偵測、弱點掃描、封包收集分析等工具軟體。
Without the authorization of the department's network management personnel, it is prohibited to execute tools and software such as network detection, vulnerability scanning, and packet collection and analysis.
5.6.5 可攜式電腦建議安裝防毒軟體，並定期檢查作業系統修正程式與更新病毒碼為最新版本。
It is recommended to install antivirus software on portable computers, and regularly check the operating system's repair program and update the virus definitions to the latest version.
5.6.6 個人專屬行動裝置使用時應謹防資訊外洩或是中毒。
Beware of information leakage and viruses when using personal mobile devices.
5.6.7 為確保本實驗室遠距工作之安全，應訂定作業管理規範，以降低遠距工作風險，相關程序與方法請參閱「IMI-NCKU-B-010 遠端存取安全管理程序書」。
In order to ensure the security of remote work in the Lab, operation management regulations shall be formulated to reduce the risk of remote work. For related procedures and methods, please refer to "IMI-NCKU-B-010 Remote Access Security Management Process."

5.6  人員教育訓練
Personnel education and training
為促使本專案執行人員，包括本專案執行人員、委外廠商、分包商與顧問或代表人員，迅速了解專案場域業務狀況進而提高工作效能，由計畫主持人授權行政專員，向專案人員說明本專案之運作，並需配合資產擁有者政策、程序、作業標準以及資料保密等要求，進行相關訓練，促使人員於最短時間內能適應並勝任。
In order to promote the implementation of the project and help executing personnel, outsourced vendors, subcontractors, consultants, and representatives to quickly understand the business status of the project field and improve work efficiency, the project principal authorizes the administrative commissioner to explain project operations to the project personnel, and shall cooperate with the asset owner's policies, procedures, operating standards, and data confidentiality requirements, to conduct relevant training to enable personnel to swiftly adapt and gain competence.
5.6.1 本專案人員應瞭解本專案任何變更，應依據「IMI-NCKU-B-003 變更管理程序書」進行變更申請，由資產擁有者同意後，使得進行變更。
The project personnel shall be aware of any changes in the project, and shall apply for changes in accordance with the "IMI-NCKU-B-003 Change Management Process", and make changes after the asset owner agrees.
5.6.2 行政專員負責：每年招開工控資安教育訓練課程，可以上課、會議、實作等方式自行辦理訓練，並於「IMI-NCKU-D-004 人員資料表」中登錄。
The administrative commissioner is responsible for conducting industrial automation and control system cyber security education and training courses every year, in the form of classes, meetings, implementation, etc., and shall document it in the "IMI-NCKU-D-004 Personnel Data Sheet".
5.6.3 視需要派人參加外部資安相關訓練，由受訓人員辦理報名手續準時出席。
If necessary, personnel shall be sent to participate in external cyber security related training, and the trainees shall go through the registration procedures and attend on time.
5.6.4 專案場域自訓之訓練教材以相關品質文件、作業標準為主，講師由專案場域資深人員或曾接受過相關訓練之人員擔任。
The training materials for project field self-training are mainly based on relevant quality documents and operating standards, and the lecturers are senior personnel in the project field or personnel who have received relevant training.
5.6.5 外部受訓所取得之證書，正本自存，影印本與「IMI-NCKU-D-004 人員資料表」一併存查。
The original of the certificates obtained from external training shall be kept on file by self, and the photocopies shall along with the "IMI-NCKU-D-004 Personnel Data Sheet" for reference.
5.6.6 為管理訓練執行情形，應將上述各類訓練資料於訓練結束後於由行政專員記錄於「IMI-NCKU-D-004 人員資料表」中。
In order to manage the implementation of the training, the aforementioned training data shall be recorded in the "IMI-NCKU-D-004 Personnel Data Sheet" by the administrative commissioner after the training is over.
5.7  人員能力資格管理考核
Personnel capability qualification management assessment
5.7.1 人員派遣前應通過相關技術與工控資訊安全能力考核，使用「IMI-NCKU-D-007 專案人員評鑑表」進行考核，考核資料應與「IMI-NCKU-D-004 人員資料表」一併存查。
Personnel shall pass the relevant technology and industrial automation and control system cyber security capability assessment before dispatch, and use the "IMI-NCKU-D-007 Project Personnel Evaluation Form" for assessment. The assessment data shall be consistent with the "IMI-NCKU-D-004 Personnel Data Sheet" and both forms shall be kept together for inspection.
5.7.2 每年應針對工控資訊安全至少進行一次內部或外部教育訓練，每2年應進行至少一次能力考核。
At least one internal or external education and training for industrial automation and control system cyber security shall be conducted every year, and at least one ability assessment shall be conducted every 2 years.
5.8  委外廠商人員資格審查程序
Qualification review procedures for outsourced vendors
5.8.1 專案場域因技術需求，需引用委外廠商，應經過資產擁有者同意始能派遣，詳見「IMI-NCKU-B-004 委外廠商管理程序書」。
Due to the technical requirements of the project field, the outsourced vendors need to be cited, and the dispatch shall be approved by the asset owner. For details, see "IMI-NCKU-B-004 Outsourced Vendors Management Process".
5.9  人員變更管理
Personnel Change Management
5.9.1 本專案團隊因人員或技術等因素產生異動，應依據「IMI-NCKU-B-003 變更管理程序書」進行變更申請，若為人員離開本專案，需由行政專員以E-mail正式通知資產擁有者，且於該人員之「IMI-NCKU-D-004 人員資料表」中述明離開專案日期。
When the project team changes due to factors such as personnel or technology, the team shall apply for changes in accordance with "IMI-NCKU-B-003 Change Management Process". If a person leaves the project, the administrative commissioner must formally notify the asset owner via e-mail, and state the date of leaving the project in the "IMI-NCKU-D-004 Personnel Data Sheet" of the personnel.
5.9.2 本專案團隊異動經完成變更程序後，行政專員應以書面形式記錄於「IMI-NCKU-D-006 人員異動交接清單」，並重新派遣具該職位能力且獲得資格之人員，由資產擁有者同意後，始能進入專案場域執行該專案。
After processing of the changes to the project team has been completed, the administrative commissioner shall record it in the "IMI-NCKU-D-006 The Change of Personnel List" in written form, and dispatch new qualified personnel with the ability for the position; the new personnel may access the project field to execute the project after the asset owner approves.
5.10  溝通管理
Communication management
5.10.1 本實驗室應與資產擁有者確認提供之自動化解決方案是否符合IEC 62443-2-4要求。
The Lab shall confirm with the asset owner whether the provided automation solution complies with the requirements of IEC 62443-2-4.
5.10.2 本實驗室應將自動化解決方案中IACS的安全觀點傳達予資產擁有者及相關人員。
The Lab shall communicate the security perspective of IACS in automation solutions to asset owners and related personnel.
5.10.3 本實驗室應確保所提供的服務符合資產擁有者的相關規定，例如：IEC 62443-2-4要求與本實驗室內部IACS的安全要求。
The Lab shall ensure that its services provided comply with the relevant regulations of the asset owner, such as the requirements of IEC 62443-2-4 and the Lab's internal IACS security requirements.
5.10.4 本實驗室應與資產擁有者確認合約內的條文，避免對於合約內容產生誤解，對於委外廠商也需確認是否符合相關要求。
The Lab shall confirm the terms of the contract with the asset owner to avoid misunderstandings about the content of the contract. For outsourced vendors, it is also necessary to confirm whether they meet the relevant requirements.
5.10.5 若有需追蹤事項，需經由人員管理會議或線上會議決定，指派專人建立窗口，負責執行與追蹤，並回報予專案經理直至追蹤事項結束。
If there is an item that needs to be tracked, it needs to be decided through a personnel management meeting or an online meeting, and a dedicated person shall be assigned to serve as the contact window, take responsibility for implementation and tracking, and report to the project manager until the end of the tracked item.

1. 目的Purpose
為確保國立成功大學資訊與機電整合實驗室（以下簡稱本實驗室）與專案場域之委外廠商，於委外執行前或委外契約履行時，其提供之交付標的與服務作業均能符合工業自動化與控制系統資訊安全管理規範，特制定本程序書。
To ensure that the National Cheng Kung University Information and Mechatronics Integration Lab (hereinafter referred to as "the Lab") and the outsourced vendors for project fields comply with the industrial automation and control system cyber security management specifications for the verification of deliverables and service operations provided prior to or during the execution of outsourcing contracts, this process is hereby established.
2. 適用範圍Scope of Application
2.1 適用於本實驗室與專案場域之相關委外服務項目，包括：
Outsourced Services of the Lab and the project field, including:
2.1.1 工業自動化設備。
Industrial automation equipment.
2.1.2 主機系統委外採購與維護。
Outsourced procurement and maintenance of the host system.
2.1.3 網路相關硬體設備委外採購與維護。
Outsourced procurement and maintenance of network-related hardware equipment.
2.1.4 應用系統套裝軟體客製化及維護
Customization and maintenance of application system package software.
2.1.5 專業顧問服務委外
Outsourced professional consulting services.
3. 權責Roles and Responsibilities
3.1 專案團隊︰負責依據本程序書之規定，提出適當之安全需求及擬定與廠商服務相關合約內容，並確實在合約中訂定保密條款。
Project team: Responsible for proposing appropriate security requirements and formulating the content of contracts related to vendors services, in accordance with the provisions of this process document, and ensuring the inclusion of confidentiality clauses in the contracts.
3.2 業務權責單位Business Authority and Responsible Unit:
3.2.1 負責審查專案團隊所擬定之合約，確認合約內容無違反本實驗室應遵循之相關規定或傷害本實驗室之權益。
Responsible for reviewing the contract drawn up by the project team, confirming that the content of the contract does not violate the relevant regulations of the Lab that shall be followed or damage the rights and interests of the Lab.
3.2.2 對於提供委外服務之廠商遴選，應符合專案團隊所提出之安全需求及採購辦法之規範。
The selection of the vendors that provide outsourced service shall comply with the security requirements and procurement methods proposed by the project team.

5. 作業說明Operation Instructions
5.1 一般條款
General terms
5.1.1 委外廠商及其服務人員，均應遵守專案場域之「IMI-NCKU-A-001 工業自動化與控制系統資訊安全政策」、法規與作業程序。
The outsourcing vendors and their service personnel shall comply with the "IMI-NCKU-A-001 Industrial Automation and Control System Cyber Security Policy," regulations, and operating procedures of the project field.
5.1.2 委外廠商應負責系統維護、聯絡窗口及電話詢答服務，並解決系統相關事宜，並配合本實驗室相關程序辦理異常排除及通報事宜，如必要時應提供駐點服務。
The outsourcing vendors shall be responsible for system maintenance, contact windows and telephone inquiry service, and solve system-related matters, and cooperate with the relevant procedures of the Lab to handle abnormalities and notification matters, and provide on-site services if necessary.
5.1.3 委外廠商應遵守本實驗室之相關規定，並簽訂「IMI-NCKU-D-005 委外廠商與人員保密切結書」。
The outsourcing vendors shall comply with the relevant regulations of the Lab, and sign the "IMI-NCKU-D-011 Confidentiality Agreement for External Suppliers and Personnel".
5.1.4 委外廠商履行合約提供使用之軟體，均需為合法軟體，並不得違反智慧財產權之規定，如有違反事情發生，委外廠商須承擔所有法律責任。
The software provided by the outsourcing vendors to perform the contract must be legal software and must not violate the provisions of intellectual property rights. If any violation occurs, the outsourcing vendors must assume all legal liability.
5.1.5 委外廠商使用之工具軟體及處理作業之執行紀錄，本實驗室有權進行稽核，廠商不得異議。
The Lab has the right to audit the execution records of the tool software and processing operations used by outsourcing vendors, and the vendors shall not object.
5.1.6 委外廠商應留存異常處理紀錄，本實驗室得視需要查核。
The outsourcing vendors shall keep abnormal handling records, which may be checked by the Lab as needed.
5.1.7 委外廠商所交付之標的物如侵害第三人合法權益時，應由承包廠商負責處理並承擔一切法律責任。
The contracting party shall be responsible for handling and assuming all legal liabilities when the deliverables provided by the outsourcing vendors infringe upon the legitimate rights and interests of third parties.
5.1.8 委外廠商如因其員工執行業務之過失，造成本實驗室損失或傷害，委外廠商需負損害賠償責任。
If the outsourcing vendors' employees causes loss or injury to the Lab due to the negligence in the course of business, the outsourcing vendors shall be liable for damages.
5.1.9 委外廠商相關系統之開發或負責人員離職時，應繳回其所借用之設備、軟體及作業權限。
The equipment, software, and operating license loaned to the outsourcing vendors shall be returned when the developer or other responsible personnel of the relevant system of the outsourcing vendors leave the job.
5.1.10 委外廠商人員於支援業務時所獲知敏感等級以上資訊，不得對外透露。
Personnel from outsourced vendors, while providing support services, shall not disclose sensitive information classified at or above the designated sensitivity level to external parties.
5.1.11 委外廠商如知悉或觀察到本實驗室系統之任何可疑的資訊安全弱點應立即通報本實驗室，並保留相關證據。
If the outsourcing vendors knows or observes any suspicious cyber security weaknesses of the Lab system, they shall immediately report to the Lab and retain relevant evidence.
5.2 委外廠商要求與評估作業
Requirements and assessment for outsourcing vendors
5.2.1 業務委外之需求，應參考專案場域需求規格，並請委外廠商提供適當之服務建議書。
The requirements for business outsourcing shall be based on the project field requirements specification, and the outsourcing vendor shall be requested to provide a suitable service proposal.
5.2.2 軟體委外採購時，得將「IMI-NCKU-D-009 廠商軟體評估表」列為建議書徵求說明文件之附件，以評估廠商所提供軟體之安全性。
When software is outsourced, the "IMI-NCKU-D-009 Vendor Software Evaluation Form" may be listed as an attachment to the proposal request document to evaluate the security of the software provided by the vendor.
5.2.3 硬體委外採購時，得將「IMI-NCKU-D-010 廠商硬體評估表」列為建議書徵求說明文件之附件，以評估廠商所提供硬體之安全性。
When hardware is outsourced, the "IMI-NCKU-D-010 Vendor Hardware Evaluation Form" may be listed as an attachment to the proposal request document to evaluate the safety of the hardware provided by the vendor.
5.2.4 委外廠商訂定資訊安全需求：
The cyber security requirements of the outsourcing vendor:
(1) 委外廠商應提供參與本案相關人員之學歷、工作資格及在職證明文件。
The outsourcing vendor shall provide the academic qualifications, work qualifications, and on-the-job certification documents of the relevant personnel involved the project.
(2) 委外廠商需保證與委外作業有關的各方（包括分包商）都應遵守資訊安全法令規定。
The outsourcing vendors need to ensure that all parties (including subcontractors) related to outsourced operations shall comply with cyber security laws and regulations.
(3) 委外廠商於本專案發生重大資訊安全威脅時，應配合提供維護服務。
The outsourcing vendor shall provide maintenance services when a major cyber security threat occurs in the project.
(4) 對於專案中資訊安全之需求，本實驗室保有查核之權利。
The Lab reserves the right to review the cyber security requirements in the project.
(5) 本實驗室為落實委外之管理監督，得定期對委外廠商進行查核作業。
In order to implement the management and supervision of outsourcing, the Lab may regularly review the outsourcing vendors.
5.3 資訊系統委外服務提出
Request for outsourcing of information system services
5.3.1 專案團隊因業務需求提出資訊委外服務，應適當評估資訊委外之必要性。
The project team shall assess the necessity of outsourcing information services based on business requirements.
5.3.2 若為主機系統之委外採購，專案團隊應對系統需求做適當規劃，以確保足夠的電腦處理及儲存容量。
For the outsourced procurement of the mainframe system, the project team shall make proper planning for the system requirements to ensure sufficient computer processing and storage capacity.
5.4 資產識別與風險評鑑作業
Asset identification and risk assessment operations
5.4.1 專案團隊應依據「IMI-NCKU-B-006 威脅與風險評鑑程序書」，依照委外標的之資訊資產價值、可用性、機密性、完整性等級，適當評估其可能之威脅及弱點。
The project team shall evaluate the potential threats and vulnerabilities based on the value, availability, confidentiality, and integrity levels of the outsourced information assets, in accordance with the "IMI-NCKU-B-006 Threat and Risk Assessment Management Process".
5.5 選擇或新增安全需求Select or add security requirements
5.5.1 專案團隊依據上述風險評鑑結果，進行風險管理作業，選擇適用之安全需求項目，明訂於合約之中。
The project team performs risk management operations based on the above risk assessment results, selects applicable security requirements items, and clearly records them in the contract.
5.6 硬體採購與維護Hardware procurement and maintenance
5.6.1 廠商應提供與設備主機之架構、操作、管理、維護等相關之操作手冊、文件與技術支援，如必要亦應提供教育訓練課程。
The vendor shall provide operation manuals, documents and technical support related to the structure, operation, management and maintenance of the equipment host, and shall also provide education and training courses if necessary.
5.7 系統帳號管理System account management
5.7.1 委外系統資料、軟體或作業系統最高權限帳號、資料庫最高權限帳號，應由本實驗室計畫主持人或專案經理保管，不得直接授與委外廠商使用。
The outsourced system data, software or operating system account with the highest authority, and the database account with the highest authority shall be kept by the project principal or project manager of the Lab, and shall not be directly granted to the outsourcing vendors for use.
5.7.2 委外廠商之人員如因作業需求，需對本實驗室系統進行存取，應遵循相關安全管理規範，並由本實驗室人員填寫「IMI-NCKU-D-011 場域服務變更申請表」代為提出申請。
If the personnel of the outsourcing vendor need to access the Lab system due to operational requirements, they shall follow the relevant security management regulations, and submit an "IMI-NCKU-D-011 Change of Field Service Application Form" on behalf of the Lab personnel.
5.7.3 「IMI-NCKU-D-011 場域服務變更申請表」中應載明作業需求內容、所需權限、帳號有效時間，經由計畫主持人核准後，由專案經理依照所需權限及帳號有效時間，建立獨立之帳號供委外廠商人員使用。
The "IMI-NCKU-D-011 Change of Field Service Application Form" shall specify the content of the operation requirements, the required authority, and the valid time of the account. After approval by the project principal, the project manager shall create a separate account for the outsourcing vendor personnel according to the required authority and account validity time.

5. 作業說明Operation instruction
5.1 啟動變更請求Initiate a change request
當變更提出者參照識別變更來源所定義的分類去執行變更請求管理，需填寫「IMI-NCKU-D-008 專案場域變更申請表」。
When the change initiator refers to the classification defined by the change source to execute change request management, the "IMI-NCKU-D-008 Project Field Change Request Form" shall be filled out.
5.2 評估變更請求Assessing the request for change
當提出變更申請後，由專案經理進行識別影響項目、進行對影響的風險評估、提出變更規劃書（含程序書、測試、人員訓練等）後，由計畫主持人做最終決斷，並提報資產擁有者。
After submitting a change request, the project manager shall identify the impacted items, perform a risk assessment on the impacts, and develop a change plan (including process, testing, and personnel training). The final decision shall be made by the project principal, who shall then report to the asset owner.
5.3 變更請求通知Change request notification
經計畫主持人授權後，由專案經理向資產擁有者報告變更項目、變更順序以及人員訓練規劃，且應得到資產擁有者核准，若資產擁有者不核准，則需告知相關風險，資產擁有者之建議應紀錄於該「IMI-NCKU-D-008 專案場域變更申請表」。
After being authorized by the project principal, the project manager contacts the asset owner to report the change items, change sequence, and personnel training plan, which must be approved by the asset owner. If the asset owner does not approve, it shall be informed of the relevant risks, and the recommendations shall be recorded in the "IMI-NCKU-D-008 Project Field Change Request Form".
5.4 安全檢查Security check
當變更完成準備運轉前，應執行測試前安全檢查，避免惡意程式影響場域運作並且有適當的修補措施，應參考「IMI-NCKU-B-013 惡意軟體防護管理程序」與「IMI-NCKU-B-014 修補管理程序書」進行，確認完成下列事項確認無誤後，始可作業：
When the change is complete and prepare for operation, a pre-test security check shall be performed to prevent malicious programs from affecting field operations, and appropriate patch measures shall be taken. It shall be implemented by refer to "IMI-NCKU-B-013 Malware Protection Management Process" and "IMI-NCKU-B-014 Patch Management Process". After confirming that the following items are completed and correct, the operation can be performed:
5.4.1 應執行之風險評估及所提之改善建議均已完成。
The risk assessment that shall be performed and the proposed improvement recommendations have been completed.
5.4.2 場域施工與建置均符合設計之規格。
Field establishment and construction are in compliance with the design specifications.
5.4.3 操作、維修、異常及緊急應變處理等程序均已完成修正更新。
Operation, maintenance, abnormality and emergency response procedures have been corrected and updated.
5.4.4 確認變更影響所及之人員均完成告知或訓練。
Confirm that all personnel affected by the change have been notified or trained.
5.4.5 相關的圖樣、作業程序、操作參數等文件資料均已修訂更新。
Relevant documents such as drawings, operating procedures, and operating parameters have been revised and updated.
5.4.6 上述所有項目經確認無誤後，始可作業。
After all the above items are confirmed to be correct, the operation can be started.
5.5 人員告知與教育訓練Personnel notification and training
告知或訓練之目的在於確保相關人員能安全的操作變更後之設備、設施或程序，並能熟練的處理任何可能發生之異常或緊急狀況。因此，對於變更影響所及之人員，包含操作、維修保養、承攬等人員，應於變更正式啟用前告知修改之相關事項或施予必要之訓練，以降低因變更而引起之風險，人員訓練應依據「IMI-NCKU-B-002 場域人員管理程序書」進行。
The purpose of notification or training is to ensure that the relevant personnel can safely operate the changed equipment, facilities, or procedures, and proficiently handle any potential abnormalities or emergencies that may occur. Therefore, for the personnel affected by the change, including operators, maintenance, contractors, etc., they shall be notified of the relevant items of the modification or given necessary training before the change is official opening, so as to reduce the risks associated with the change. Personnel training shall be conducted according to "IMI-NCKU-B-002 Field Personnel Management Process".
5.6 變更請求追蹤Change Request Tracking
監督變更進度、監督變更狀態、追蹤變更直到關閉。若有需追蹤事項，需經由內部會議決定，並指派專人負責執行，由專案經理進行追蹤，至追蹤事項結束。變更正式使用後，如確認為永久變更，其相關作業管制標準書，應於三個月內修改完成，並實施教育訓練，並記錄存查。
Monitor change progress, monitor change status, track changes until closure. If there is an item that needs to be tracked, it needs to be decided by an internal meeting; a dedicated person must be assigned to be responsible for the implementation and tracking by the project manager until the end of the tracking event. After the change is official implemented, if it is confirmed as a permanent change, the relevant operation control standard shall be revised and completed within 3 months, and education and training shall be implemented, and records shall be kept for inspection.
5.7 完成變更後通知Notification after completion of changes
以上相關作業均已完成後，應以E-mail或其他適當的方式通知予資產擁有者作為正式通知。
After the aforementioned operations have been completed, the asset owner shall be formally notified via e-mail or any other appropriates means of communication.

維護本實驗室所提供專案場域之資訊資產正常運作，防止資訊或資訊系統受未經授權之存取、使用、控制、洩漏、破壞、竄改、銷毀或其他侵害，並確保其資產之可用性、完整性與機密性，且所有專案團隊人員應共同努力達成下列目標：
In order to maintain the normal operation of information assets in the project field provided by the Lab, prevent information or information systems from unauthorized access, use, control, leakage, destruction, tampering, destruction or other infringements; and ensure the availability, integrity and confidentiality of their assets, all project team personnel shall work together to achieve the following goals:
5.1 保護本實驗室與專案場域資訊業務活動，避免未經授權的存取。
Protect the Lab and project field cyber operation activities to avoid unauthorized access.
5.2 保護本實驗室與專案場域資訊業務活動，避免未經授權的修改，確保其正確且完整。
Protect the Lab and project field cyber operation activities to avoid unauthorized modification, and ensure its correctness and completeness.
5.3 依照客戶對於工業自動化資訊安全要求，建立工業自動化資訊安全專案場域服務，進行專案場域風險管理，並依循IEC 62443-2-4需求項目落實品質管理循環(PDCA)精神，以持續改善工業自動化資訊安全管理系統之有效性。
According to the client's requirements for industrial automation cyber security, establish industrial automation cyber security services for the project field, conduct risk management for the project field, and follow the IEC 62443-2-4 requirements items to implement the spirit of the quality management cycle (Plan-Do-Check-Act cycle, PDCA) to continuously improve the effectiveness of the industrial automation cyber security management system.
5.4 辦理本實驗室與專案場域有關資訊安全教育訓練，提供單位學員資訊安全之意識與強化其對責任之認知。
Conduct cyber security education and training in the Lab and project field, and enhance the awareness of cyber security among department members while reinforcing their understanding of responsibilities.
5.5 本實驗室及專案場域有關工業自動化資訊安全業務活動的執行須符合法令或法規之要求。
The implementation of the industrial automation cyber security operation activities in the Lab and the project field must comply with the requirements of laws and regulations.
5.6 透過利害相關人及議題等要求事項，達成與資訊安全政策一致之預期。
Achieving alignment with cyber security policy expectations through stakeholder requirements and issues etc.
6. 責任Responsibilities 
6.1 管理階層應積極參與及支持資訊安全管理制度，並透過適當的標準和程序以實施本政策。
Managers shall actively participate in and support the cyber security management system and implement this policy through appropriate standards and procedures.
6.2 專案人員、委外廠商與專案相關之外部單位及人員均需依照相關安全管理程序以維護資訊安全政策。
Project personnel, subcontractors, and project-related external units and personnel must follow relevant security management procedures to maintain cyber security policies.
6.3 所有人員皆有責任報告資訊安全事件和任何已鑑別出之弱點。
All personnel are responsible for reporting cyber security incidents and any identified vulnerabilities.
6.4 任何危及資訊安全之行為，將視情節輕重追究其刑事、民事及行政責任，或依成功大學之相關規定進行懲處。
Any actions that endangers cyber security shall be investigated for criminal, civil, and administrative responsibilities depending on the severity of the case, or shall be punished according to the relevant regulations of NCKU.
7. 審查Review
7.1 本政策應至少每年審查一次，以反映政府法令、技術及業務等最新發展現況，並確保本校永續運作及工控資訊安全實務作業之能力。
This policy shall be reviewed at least once a year to reflect the latest developments in government laws, technology, and business, and to ensure the sustainable operation of the school and the capability of industrial automation and control system cyber security practices.
7.2 當專案團隊或專案發生重大改變時應主動進行審查。
This policy shall be actively reviewed when the project team or project undergoes significant changes.
8. 實施Implementation
本政策需經專案團隊進行查驗後實施，修正時亦同。
This policy and its revisions shall be implemented after being reviewed by the project team.

Implement the resolutions of the Cyber Security Management Committee.

Identify laws and regulations related to cyber security.

processing status of the proposals from previous management reviews.

5.3.2 「IMI-NCKU-D-002 外部單位聯絡清單」每年至少一次由專案經理負責維護，視組織或合約變動適時更新。
The "IMI-NCKU-D-002 External Contact List" shall be updated by the project manager at least once a year, and revised in due course depending on changes in the organization or contract.
5.3.3 應隨時與資訊安全技術相關團體維持聯繫，獲取資訊安全技術及產品資訊與知識，以及處理資訊安全事件或執行系統修補資訊等，並將資訊建立於「IMI-NCKU-D-002 外部單位聯絡清單」，由資訊安全小組負責維護更新。
Keep in touch with groups related to cyber security technology at all times to obtain information and knowledge on cyber security technology and products, as well as to deal with cyber security incidents and implement the information of system patch. The information shall be documented in "IMI-NCKU-D-002 External Contact List," which maintained and updated by the Cyber Security Team.
5.3.4 參考「IMI-NCKU-B-011 事件管理程序書」與相關權責單位建立通報管道並執行通報作業，聯繫方式應詳列於「IMI-NCKU-D-002 外部單位聯絡清單」。
Refer to "IMI-NCKU-B-011 Incident Management Process" to establish notification channels with relevant responsible units and execute notification operations. The contact information shall be listed in the "IMI-NCKU-D-002 External Contact List."
5.4 資訊安全目標的達成計畫與量測方式
Cyber Security Target Achievement Plan and Measurement Method
5.4.1 資訊安全目標應與資訊安全政策一致並可量測，同時應考量適用之資訊安全要求，以及風險評鑑及處理之結果。並將資訊安全目標與相關事項傳達給本實驗室人員、委外廠商與資安作業相關單位，且於定期或組之重大變更時進行更新。
Cyber security objectives shall be consistent with the cyber security policy and must be measurable. At the same time, the applicable cyber security requirements and the results of risk assessment and treatment shall be taken into consideration. Cyber security goals and related matters shall be communicated to the Lab's personnel, outsourced vendors, and cyber security operation related units, and the goals shall be updated regularly or when there are major changes in the organization.
5.4.2 應定期規劃達成資訊安全目標作業，應包含：
The operation to achieve cyber security objectives shall be regularly planned and shall include:
(1) 相關執行活動或事項。
Relevant implementation activities or items.
(2) 所需投入之人員、預算、設備技術與程序表單等資源。
Required resources such as personnel, budget, equipment technology, and procedure lists.
(3) 活動或事項負責人員。
Personnel responsible for the activities or items.
(4) 活動或事項預計完成時間。
Estimated completion time of activities or items.
(5) 管理目標是否達成之評估方式。
Evaluation method of whether management objectives were achieved
5.4.3 完成上述資訊安全目標達成作業規劃並詳列於「IMI-NCKU-D-003 資安管理指標暨有效性量測表」，由資訊安全小組負責維護更新。
The operation plan for achieving the aforementioned cyber security objectives shall be developed and documented in "IMI-NCKU-D-003 Cyber Security Management Indicators and Effectiveness Evaluation Form," which shall be maintained and updated by the Cyber Security Team.
5.5 專案管理的資訊安全
Cyber Security for Project Management
5.5.1 無論任何型態的專案，於需求說明書或契約書中，應對資訊安全加以陳述。
In any type of project, cyber security shall be addressed in the requirements specification or contract document.
5.5.2 專案啟始時應執行風險評鑑，以評估專案實施階段可能發生的資訊安全風險。
Risk assessment shall be carried out at the beginning of the project to assess the cyber security risks that may occur during the project implementation stage.
5.5.3 資訊安全專案管理之運作應依據專案管理五階段：啟始(Initiating)、規劃(Planning)、執行(Executing)、監控(Monitoring)和結束(Closing)，將資訊安全管理制度規範納入該專案的每一個階段進行控管。
Operation of cyber security project management shall be based on five phases of project management: Initiating, Planning, Executing, Monitoring, and Closing, and cyber security management system rules shall be included in the project controls at every stage of the Project.
5.5.4 專案管理應對專案相關人員進行角色界定與責任配置。
Project management shall define the roles and assign responsibilities of project-related personnel.
5.6 行動裝置及遠距工作
Mobile Devices and Remote Working
5.6.1 私人之行動裝置連結本實驗室無線網路，應有正常登錄程序。
There shall be a normal login procedure for personal mobile devices to connect to the Lab's wireless network.
5.6.2 公務之行動裝置不得破解或越獄，程式應於合法官方管道下載。
School-issued mobile devices must not be cracked or jailbroken, and programs shall be downloaded from legitimate official channels.
5.6.3 勿於公務之行動裝置隨意點選社群網站或即時通訊軟體中之超連結。
Do not randomly click on hyperlinks in social networking sites or instant messaging software when using official mobile devices.
5.6.4 未經單位網路管理人員授權許可，禁止執行網路偵測、弱點掃描、封包收集分析等工具軟體。
Without the authorization of the department's network management personnel, it is prohibited to execute tools and software such as network detection, vulnerability scanning, and packet collection and analysis.
5.6.5 可攜式電腦建議安裝防毒軟體，並定期檢查作業系統修正程式與更新病毒碼為最新版本。
It is recommended to install antivirus software on portable computers, and regularly check the operating system's repair program and update the virus definitions to the latest version.
5.6.6 個人專屬行動裝置使用時應謹防資訊外洩或是中毒。
Beware of information leakage and viruses when using personal mobile devices.
5.6.7 為確保本實驗室遠距工作之安全，應訂定作業管理規範，以降低遠距工作風險，相關程序與方法請參閱「IMI-NCKU-B-010 遠端存取安全管理程序書」。
In order to ensure the security of remote work in the Lab, operation management regulations shall be formulated to reduce the risk of remote work. For related procedures and methods, please refer to "IMI-NCKU-B-010 Remote Access Security Management Process."

5.5  人員指派辦法
Personnel assignment method
5.5.1 本專案人員，包括本專案執行人員、委外廠商、分包商與顧問或代表人員，派遣至專案場域前，需了解資產擁有者之政策、程序等要求，並使用「IMI-NCKU-D-007 專案人員評鑑表」評核後合格者，經計畫主持人同意後，由行政專員以書面形式通知資產擁有者，待資產擁有者核准後，始能進入資產擁有者專案場域執行該專案。
The project personnel, including project executives, outsourced vendors, subcontractors, consultants, and representatives need to understand the asset owner's policies, procedures, and other requirements before being dispatched to the project field, and use the "IMI-NCKU-D-007 Project Personnel Evaluation Form." After the evaluation, if the project principal approves, the administrative commissioner shall notify the asset owner in writing. After the asset owner approves, the personnel can enter the asset owner's project field for execution the project.
5.5.2 派遣至本專案人員，包括本專案執行人員、委外廠商、分包商與顧問或代表人員，應遵守資產擁有者於場域的各項資訊安全要求的政策和程序，如：變更管理、工作許可等，並提供背景資料與犯罪紀錄調查（如，良民證），經行政專員確認符合本專案人員條件後，簽署「IMI-NCKU-D-005 委外廠商與人員保密切結書」作為依據。
All personnel assigned to the project, including executing personnel, outsourced vendors, subcontractors, consultants, and representatives, shall comply with the policies and procedures of the asset owner's various cyber security requirements in the field, such as management of changes (MoC), permit to work (PtW), etc., and shall provide background information and criminal record investigation (such as Police Criminal Record Certificate). After the administrative commissioner confirms that the person meets the requirements for project personnel, they must sign the "IMI-NCKU-D-005 Confidentiality Agreement for External Suppliers and Personnel" as the basis.

Personnel education and training
為促使本專案執行人員，包括本專案執行人員、委外廠商、分包商與顧問或代表人員，迅速了解專案場域業務狀況進而提高工作效能，由計畫主持人授權行政專員，向專案人員說明本專案之運作，並需配合資產擁有者政策、程序、作業標準以及資料保密等要求，進行相關訓練，促使人員於最短時間內能適應並勝任。
In order to promote the implementation of the project and help executing personnel, outsourced vendors, subcontractors, consultants, and representatives to quickly understand the business status of the project field and improve work efficiency, the project principal authorizes the administrative commissioner to explain project operations to the project personnel, and shall cooperate with the asset owner's policies, procedures, operating standards, and data confidentiality requirements, to conduct relevant training to enable personnel to swiftly adapt and gain competence.

The project personnel shall be aware of any changes in the project, and shall apply for changes in accordance with the "IMI-NCKU-B-003 Change Management Process", and make changes after the asset owner agrees.

5.6.3 視需要派人參加外部資安相關訓練，由受訓人員辦理報名手續準時出席。
If necessary, personnel shall be sent to participate in external cyber security related training, and the trainees shall go through the registration procedures and attend on time.
5.6.4 專案場域自訓之訓練教材以相關品質文件、作業標準為主，講師由專案場域資深人員或曾接受過相關訓練之人員擔任。
The training materials for project field self-training are mainly based on relevant quality documents and operating standards, and the lecturers are senior personnel in the project field or personnel who have received relevant training.
5.6.5 外部受訓所取得之證書，正本自存，影印本與「IMI-NCKU-D-004 人員資料表」一併存查。
The original of the certificates obtained from external training shall be kept on file by self, and the photocopies shall along with the "IMI-NCKU-D-004 Personnel Data Sheet" for reference.

5.9  人員變更管理
Personnel Change Management
5.9.1 本專案團隊因人員或技術等因素產生異動，應依據「IMI-NCKU-B-003 變更管理程序書」進行變更申請，若為人員離開本專案，需由行政專員以E-mail正式通知資產擁有者，且於該人員之「IMI-NCKU-D-004 人員資料表」中述明離開專案日期。
When the project team changes due to factors such as personnel or technology, the team shall apply for changes in accordance with "IMI-NCKU-B-003 Change Management Process". If a person leaves the project, the administrative commissioner must formally notify the asset owner via e-mail, and state the date of leaving the project in the "IMI-NCKU-D-004 Personnel Data Sheet" of the personnel.
5.9.2 本專案團隊異動經完成變更程序後，行政專員應以書面形式記錄於「IMI-NCKU-D-006 人員異動交接清單」，並重新派遣具該職位能力且獲得資格之人員，由資產擁有者同意後，始能進入專案場域執行該專案。
After processing of the changes to the project team has been completed, the administrative commissioner shall record it in the "IMI-NCKU-D-006 The Change of Personnel List" in written form, and dispatch new qualified personnel with the ability for the position; the new personnel may access the project field to execute the project after the asset owner approves.
5.10  溝通管理
Communication management
5.10.1 本實驗室應與資產擁有者確認提供之自動化解決方案是否符合IEC 62443-2-4要求。
The Lab shall confirm with the asset owner whether the provided automation solution complies with the requirements of IEC 62443-2-4.
5.10.2 本實驗室應將自動化解決方案中IACS的安全觀點傳達予資產擁有者及相關人員。
The Lab shall communicate the security perspective of IACS in automation solutions to asset owners and related personnel.
5.10.3 本實驗室應確保所提供的服務符合資產擁有者的相關規定，例如：IEC 62443-2-4要求與本實驗室內部IACS的安全要求。
The Lab shall ensure that its services provided comply with the relevant regulations of the asset owner, such as the requirements of IEC 62443-2-4 and the Lab's internal IACS security requirements.
5.10.4 本實驗室應與資產擁有者確認合約內的條文，避免對於合約內容產生誤解，對於委外廠商也需確認是否符合相關要求。
The Lab shall confirm the terms of the contract with the asset owner to avoid misunderstandings about the content of the contract. For outsourced vendors, it is also necessary to confirm whether they meet the relevant requirements.
5.10.5 若有需追蹤事項，需經由人員管理會議或線上會議決定，指派專人建立窗口，負責執行與追蹤，並回報予專案經理直至追蹤事項結束。
If there is an item that needs to be tracked, it needs to be decided through a personnel management meeting or an online meeting, and a dedicated person shall be assigned to serve as the contact window, take responsibility for implementation and tracking, and report to the project manager until the end of the tracked item.

1. 目的Purpose
為確保國立成功大學資訊與機電整合實驗室（以下簡稱本實驗室）與專案場域之委外廠商，於委外執行前或委外契約履行時，其提供之交付標的與服務作業均能符合工業自動化與控制系統資訊安全管理規範，特制定本程序書。
To ensure that the National Cheng Kung University Information and Mechatronics Integration Lab (hereinafter referred to as "the Lab") and the outsourced vendors for project fields comply with the industrial automation and control system cyber security management specifications for the verification of deliverables and service operations provided prior to or during the execution of outsourcing contracts, this process is hereby established.
2. 適用範圍Scope of Application
2.1 適用於本實驗室與專案場域之相關委外服務項目，包括：
Outsourced Services of the Lab and the project field, including:
2.1.1 工業自動化設備。
Industrial automation equipment.
2.1.2 主機系統委外採購與維護。
Outsourced procurement and maintenance of the host system.
2.1.3 網路相關硬體設備委外採購與維護。
Outsourced procurement and maintenance of network-related hardware equipment.
2.1.4 應用系統套裝軟體客製化及維護
Customization and maintenance of application system package software.
2.1.5 專業顧問服務委外
Outsourced professional consulting services.
3. 權責Roles and Responsibilities
3.1 專案團隊︰負責依據本程序書之規定，提出適當之安全需求及擬定與廠商服務相關合約內容，並確實在合約中訂定保密條款。
Project team: Responsible for proposing appropriate security requirements and formulating the content of contracts related to vendors services, in accordance with the provisions of this process document, and ensuring the inclusion of confidentiality clauses in the contracts.
3.2 業務權責單位Business Authority and Responsible Unit:
3.2.1 負責審查專案團隊所擬定之合約，確認合約內容無違反本實驗室應遵循之相關規定或傷害本實驗室之權益。
Responsible for reviewing the contract drawn up by the project team, confirming that the content of the contract does not violate the relevant regulations of the Lab that shall be followed or damage the rights and interests of the Lab.
3.2.2 對於提供委外服務之廠商遴選，應符合專案團隊所提出之安全需求及採購辦法之規範。
The selection of the vendors that provide outsourced service shall comply with the security requirements and procurement methods proposed by the project team.

5. 作業說明Operation Instructions
5.1 一般條款
General terms
5.1.1 委外廠商及其服務人員，均應遵守專案場域之「IMI-NCKU-A-001 工業自動化與控制系統資訊安全政策」、法規與作業程序。
The outsourcing vendors and their service personnel shall comply with the "IMI-NCKU-A-001 Industrial Automation and Control System Cyber Security Policy," regulations, and operating procedures of the project field.
5.1.2 委外廠商應負責系統維護、聯絡窗口及電話詢答服務，並解決系統相關事宜，並配合本實驗室相關程序辦理異常排除及通報事宜，如必要時應提供駐點服務。
The outsourcing vendors shall be responsible for system maintenance, contact windows and telephone inquiry service, and solve system-related matters, and cooperate with the relevant procedures of the Lab to handle abnormalities and notification matters, and provide on-site services if necessary.
5.1.3 委外廠商應遵守本實驗室之相關規定，並簽訂「IMI-NCKU-D-005 委外廠商與人員保密切結書」。
The outsourcing vendors shall comply with the relevant regulations of the Lab, and sign the "IMI-NCKU-D-011 Confidentiality Agreement for External Suppliers and Personnel".
5.1.4 委外廠商履行合約提供使用之軟體，均需為合法軟體，並不得違反智慧財產權之規定，如有違反事情發生，委外廠商須承擔所有法律責任。
The software provided by the outsourcing vendors to perform the contract must be legal software and must not violate the provisions of intellectual property rights. If any violation occurs, the outsourcing vendors must assume all legal liability.
5.1.5 委外廠商使用之工具軟體及處理作業之執行紀錄，本實驗室有權進行稽核，廠商不得異議。
The Lab has the right to audit the execution records of the tool software and processing operations used by outsourcing vendors, and the vendors shall not object.
5.1.6 委外廠商應留存異常處理紀錄，本實驗室得視需要查核。
The outsourcing vendors shall keep abnormal handling records, which may be checked by the Lab as needed.
5.1.7 委外廠商所交付之標的物如侵害第三人合法權益時，應由承包廠商負責處理並承擔一切法律責任。
The contracting party shall be responsible for handling and assuming all legal liabilities when the deliverables provided by the outsourcing vendors infringe upon the legitimate rights and interests of third parties.
5.1.8 委外廠商如因其員工執行業務之過失，造成本實驗室損失或傷害，委外廠商需負損害賠償責任。
If the outsourcing vendors' employees causes loss or injury to the Lab due to the negligence in the course of business, the outsourcing vendors shall be liable for damages.
5.1.9 委外廠商相關系統之開發或負責人員離職時，應繳回其所借用之設備、軟體及作業權限。
The equipment, software, and operating license loaned to the outsourcing vendors shall be returned when the developer or other responsible personnel of the relevant system of the outsourcing vendors leave the job.
5.1.10 委外廠商人員於支援業務時所獲知敏感等級以上資訊，不得對外透露。
Personnel from outsourced vendors, while providing support services, shall not disclose sensitive information classified at or above the designated sensitivity level to external parties.
5.1.11 委外廠商如知悉或觀察到本實驗室系統之任何可疑的資訊安全弱點應立即通報本實驗室，並保留相關證據。
If the outsourcing vendors knows or observes any suspicious cyber security weaknesses of the Lab system, they shall immediately report to the Lab and retain relevant evidence.
5.2 委外廠商要求與評估作業
Requirements and assessment for outsourcing vendors
5.2.1 業務委外之需求，應參考專案場域需求規格，並請委外廠商提供適當之服務建議書。
The requirements for business outsourcing shall be based on the project field requirements specification, and the outsourcing vendor shall be requested to provide a suitable service proposal.
5.2.2 軟體委外採購時，得將「IMI-NCKU-D-009 廠商軟體評估表」列為建議書徵求說明文件之附件，以評估廠商所提供軟體之安全性。
When software is outsourced, the "IMI-NCKU-D-009 Vendor Software Evaluation Form" may be listed as an attachment to the proposal request document to evaluate the security of the software provided by the vendor.
5.2.3 硬體委外採購時，得將「IMI-NCKU-D-010 廠商硬體評估表」列為建議書徵求說明文件之附件，以評估廠商所提供硬體之安全性。
When hardware is outsourced, the "IMI-NCKU-D-010 Vendor Hardware Evaluation Form" may be listed as an attachment to the proposal request document to evaluate the safety of the hardware provided by the vendor.
5.2.4 委外廠商訂定資訊安全需求：
The cyber security requirements of the outsourcing vendor:
(1) 委外廠商應提供參與本案相關人員之學歷、工作資格及在職證明文件。
The outsourcing vendor shall provide the academic qualifications, work qualifications, and on-the-job certification documents of the relevant personnel involved the project.
(2) 委外廠商需保證與委外作業有關的各方（包括分包商）都應遵守資訊安全法令規定。
The outsourcing vendors need to ensure that all parties (including subcontractors) related to outsourced operations shall comply with cyber security laws and regulations.
(3) 委外廠商於本專案發生重大資訊安全威脅時，應配合提供維護服務。
The outsourcing vendor shall provide maintenance services when a major cyber security threat occurs in the project.
(4) 對於專案中資訊安全之需求，本實驗室保有查核之權利。
The Lab reserves the right to review the cyber security requirements in the project.
(5) 本實驗室為落實委外之管理監督，得定期對委外廠商進行查核作業。
In order to implement the management and supervision of outsourcing, the Lab may regularly review the outsourcing vendors.
5.3 資訊系統委外服務提出
Request for outsourcing of information system services
5.3.1 專案團隊因業務需求提出資訊委外服務，應適當評估資訊委外之必要性。
The project team shall assess the necessity of outsourcing information services based on business requirements.
5.3.2 若為主機系統之委外採購，專案團隊應對系統需求做適當規劃，以確保足夠的電腦處理及儲存容量。
For the outsourced procurement of the mainframe system, the project team shall make proper planning for the system requirements to ensure sufficient computer processing and storage capacity.
5.4 資產識別與風險評鑑作業
Asset identification and risk assessment operations
5.4.1 專案團隊應依據「IMI-NCKU-B-006 威脅與風險評鑑程序書」，依照委外標的之資訊資產價值、可用性、機密性、完整性等級，適當評估其可能之威脅及弱點。
The project team shall evaluate the potential threats and vulnerabilities based on the value, availability, confidentiality, and integrity levels of the outsourced information assets, in accordance with the "IMI-NCKU-B-006 Threat and Risk Assessment Management Process".
5.5 選擇或新增安全需求Select or add security requirements
5.5.1 專案團隊依據上述風險評鑑結果，進行風險管理作業，選擇適用之安全需求項目，明訂於合約之中。
The project team performs risk management operations based on the above risk assessment results, selects applicable security requirements items, and clearly records them in the contract.
5.6 硬體採購與維護Hardware procurement and maintenance
5.6.1 廠商應提供與設備主機之架構、操作、管理、維護等相關之操作手冊、文件與技術支援，如必要亦應提供教育訓練課程。
The vendor shall provide operation manuals, documents and technical support related to the structure, operation, management and maintenance of the equipment host, and shall also provide education and training courses if necessary.
5.7 系統帳號管理System account management
5.7.1 委外系統資料、軟體或作業系統最高權限帳號、資料庫最高權限帳號，應由本實驗室計畫主持人或專案經理保管，不得直接授與委外廠商使用。
The outsourced system data, software or operating system account with the highest authority, and the database account with the highest authority shall be kept by the project principal or project manager of the Lab, and shall not be directly granted to the outsourcing vendors for use.
5.7.2 委外廠商之人員如因作業需求，需對本實驗室系統進行存取，應遵循相關安全管理規範，並由本實驗室人員填寫「IMI-NCKU-D-011 場域服務變更申請表」代為提出申請。
If the personnel of the outsourcing vendor need to access the Lab system due to operational requirements, they shall follow the relevant security management regulations, and submit an "IMI-NCKU-D-011 Change of Field Service Application Form" on behalf of the Lab personnel.
5.7.3 「IMI-NCKU-D-011 場域服務變更申請表」中應載明作業需求內容、所需權限、帳號有效時間，經由計畫主持人核准後，由專案經理依照所需權限及帳號有效時間，建立獨立之帳號供委外廠商人員使用。
The "IMI-NCKU-D-011 Change of Field Service Application Form" shall specify the content of the operation requirements, the required authority, and the valid time of the account. After approval by the project principal, the project manager shall create a separate account for the outsourcing vendor personnel according to the required authority and account validity time.
5.7.4 委外廠商人員對於系統帳號應善盡保管之責，系統帳號不得任意交由非作業相關人員使用。
Outsourced personnel shall be responsible for properly safeguarding system accounts, and system accounts shall not be used by individuals unrelated to the operations.
5.7.5 委外廠商人員對於系統之操作，本實驗室各系統管理者應盡監督之責，委外廠商人員不得從事非工作範圍內之操作。各系統管理者並應於委外廠商人員完成工作後檢視系統紀錄。
The system managers of the Lab shall be responsible for supervising the operation of the system by the personnel of the outsourcing vendors, and the personnel of the outsourcing vendors shall not engage in operations that are not within the scope of work. Each system manager shall also check the system records after the outsourced personnel complete the work.
5.8 緊急應變計畫Emergency response plan
5.8.1 資訊作業若涉及本實驗室之專案業務時，得要求委外廠商配合本實驗室定期進行業務永續運作計畫，針對委外標的建立緊急應變計畫，並定期進行測試；若該委外案件屬於整體委外者，應以委外系統及資料兩者中最高資訊資產價值衡量演練週期。
When it comes to projects involving the operations of the Lab, the outsourcing vendors may be required to cooperate with the Lab in developing a business continuity plan for sustainable operations. They shall establish an emergency response plan for the outsourced scope and conduct regular testing. In the case of comprehensive outsourcing, the exercise cycle shall be determined based on the higher value of either the outsourced systems or data as information assets.
5.8.2 備援需求：依據不同資訊資產價值及可用性等級，考量其備援需求，必要時，得建立異地備援機制。
Backup requirements: According to the value and availability level of different information assets, consider their backup requirements, and establish a remote backup mechanism when necessary.
5.9 可攜式電腦及儲存媒體管理
Portable computer and storage media management
5.9.1 委外廠商如需攜帶可攜式電腦或儲存媒體如磁片、光碟、隨身碟、外接式硬碟等進入專案場域使用，需經陪同之本實驗室人員同意。
If outsourcing vendors need to bring portable computers or storage media such as disks, CDs, flash drives, external hard drives, etc. into the project field for use, it must obtain the consent of the accompanying Lab's personnel.
5.9.2 廠商維修人員，當進入專案場域並使用可攜式電腦或儲存媒體時，需有監控設備進行監控或本實驗室人員全程陪同。
When the maintenance personnel of the vendor enter the project field and use portable computers or storage media, it must be monitored by monitoring equipment or accompanied by the Lab's personnel throughout the process.
5.10 例外作業Exceptional work
資訊委外服務之專案團隊應遵循本程序書之規範，提出適當安全需求項目。但若因成本、時效、委外服務之特性、委外廠商之局限性等相關因素之考量，而致本程序書所規範之安全需求無法完全適用時，專案團隊得以簽呈方式，提出其他適切之安全需求與規劃，提報計畫主持人簽核。
The project team of information outsourcing service shall follow the specification of this process and put forward appropriate security requirement. However, if due to the consideration of related factors such as cost, timeliness, characteristics of outsourced services, and limitations of outsourced vendors, the security requirements specified in this process cannot be fully applied, the project team can submit other appropriate security requirements and plans to the project principal for approval.
5.11 服務變更管理Service change management
委外廠商所提供之相關服務內容如有變更，需經由專案經理以簽呈方式通報計畫主持人，並視需求附上相關風險評鑑之佐證資料，經計畫主持人核可後，方能進行變更，其服務變更內容如下：
Any changes to the services provided by the outsourced vendor shall be communicated to the project principal by the project manager through a signed document. The document shall include relevant risk assessment supporting materials as required. After approval by the project principal, the changes can be implemented. The service changes are as follows:
5.11.1 系統網路架構改變。
System network architecture changes.
5.11.2 使用新的技術。
Use of new technologies.
5.11.3 產品轉換至新版本。
Product transition to a new version.
5.11.4 新的開發工具及環境。
New development tools and environment.

During the execution of the project, to provide proper management, tracking, and implementation of data change requests in the cyber environment, in compliance with relevant regulations, to prevent cyber security issues from intentional or unintentional threats, both internal and external, this process is hereby established.
2. 適用範圍Scope of Application
本實驗室與專案場域。
The Lab and the project field.
3. 權責Roles and Responsibilities
3.1 計畫主持人：外部溝通、人員指派。
Project principal: External communication, personnel assignment.
3.2 專案經理：監督、內外部溝通、時程規劃、風險評估、帳號管理。
Project manager: Supervision, internal and external communication, schedule planning, risk assessment, account management.
3.3 行政經理：內外部溝通、執行行政事務、人事管理事務、教育訓練召集。
Administrative commissioner: Internal and external communication, executive administrative affairs, personnel management affairs, the convening of education and training.
3.4 軟體單位：技術開發、程式修補、專案進度規劃。
Software Department: Technology development, patch the program, project schedule planning.

4. 名詞定義Definition of Terms
4.1 專案人員：本實驗室與專案場域之內部人員與委外廠商。
Project Personnel: Internal the Lab personnel and outsourced vendors.
4.2 委外廠商：支援本專案之委外廠商，包含委外廠商之分包商、顧問或代表等。
Outsourced vendors: Outsourced vendors who support this project, including subcontractors, consultants, and representatives.
4.3 變更：係指當管理本專案作業、技術、工程和原有作業規範或設計規範有所改變或偏離，且此類改變或偏離未曾執行或發生過，或雖曾發生但無紀錄或書面資料可供依循者。
Change: Refers to changes or deviations in the operation, technology, engineering, and original operating specifications or design specifications of the management project, wherein such changes or deviations have either not been implemented or occurred, or have occurred but there is no record or written information available to follow.
5. 作業說明Operation instruction
5.1 啟動變更請求Initiate a change request
當變更提出者參照識別變更來源所定義的分類去執行變更請求管理，需填寫「IMI-NCKU-D-008 專案場域變更申請表」。
When the change initiator refers to the classification defined by the change source to execute change request management, the "IMI-NCKU-D-008 Project Field Change Request Form" shall be filled out.
5.2 評估變更請求Assessing the request for change
當提出變更申請後，由專案經理進行識別影響項目、進行對影響的風險評估、提出變更規劃書（含程序書、測試、人員訓練等）後，由計畫主持人做最終決斷，並提報資產擁有者。
After submitting a change request, the project manager shall identify the impacted items, perform a risk assessment on the impacts, and develop a change plan (including process, testing, and personnel training). The final decision shall be made by the project principal, who shall then report to the asset owner.
5.3 變更請求通知Change request notification
經計畫主持人授權後，由專案經理向資產擁有者報告變更項目、變更順序以及人員訓練規劃，且應得到資產擁有者核准，若資產擁有者不核准，則需告知相關風險，資產擁有者之建議應紀錄於該「IMI-NCKU-D-008 專案場域變更申請表」。
After being authorized by the project principal, the project manager contacts the asset owner to report the change items, change sequence, and personnel training plan, which must be approved by the asset owner. If the asset owner does not approve, it shall be informed of the relevant risks, and the recommendations shall be recorded in the "IMI-NCKU-D-008 Project Field Change Request Form".
5.4 安全檢查Security check
當變更完成準備運轉前，應執行測試前安全檢查，避免惡意程式影響場域運作並且有適當的修補措施，應參考「IMI-NCKU-B-013 惡意軟體防護管理程序」與「IMI-NCKU-B-014 修補管理程序書」進行，確認完成下列事項確認無誤後，始可作業：
When the change is complete and prepare for operation, a pre-test security check shall be performed to prevent malicious programs from affecting field operations, and appropriate patch measures shall be taken. It shall be implemented by refer to "IMI-NCKU-B-013 Malware Protection Management Process" and "IMI-NCKU-B-014 Patch Management Process". After confirming that the following items are completed and correct, the operation can be performed:
5.4.1 應執行之風險評估及所提之改善建議均已完成。
The risk assessment that shall be performed and the proposed improvement recommendations have been completed.
5.4.2 場域施工與建置均符合設計之規格。
Field establishment and construction are in compliance with the design specifications.
5.4.3 操作、維修、異常及緊急應變處理等程序均已完成修正更新。
Operation, maintenance, abnormality and emergency response procedures have been corrected and updated.
5.4.4 確認變更影響所及之人員均完成告知或訓練。
Confirm that all personnel affected by the change have been notified or trained.
5.4.5 相關的圖樣、作業程序、操作參數等文件資料均已修訂更新。
Relevant documents such as drawings, operating procedures, and operating parameters have been revised and updated.
5.4.6 上述所有項目經確認無誤後，始可作業。
After all the above items are confirmed to be correct, the operation can be started.
5.5 人員告知與教育訓練Personnel notification and training
告知或訓練之目的在於確保相關人員能安全的操作變更後之設備、設施或程序，並能熟練的處理任何可能發生之異常或緊急狀況。因此，對於變更影響所及之人員，包含操作、維修保養、承攬等人員，應於變更正式啟用前告知修改之相關事項或施予必要之訓練，以降低因變更而引起之風險，人員訓練應依據「IMI-NCKU-B-002 場域人員管理程序書」進行。
The purpose of notification or training is to ensure that the relevant personnel can safely operate the changed equipment, facilities, or procedures, and proficiently handle any potential abnormalities or emergencies that may occur. Therefore, for the personnel affected by the change, including operators, maintenance, contractors, etc., they shall be notified of the relevant items of the modification or given necessary training before the change is official opening, so as to reduce the risks associated with the change. Personnel training shall be conducted according to "IMI-NCKU-B-002 Field Personnel Management Process".
5.6 變更請求追蹤Change Request Tracking
監督變更進度、監督變更狀態、追蹤變更直到關閉。若有需追蹤事項，需經由內部會議決定，並指派專人負責執行，由專案經理進行追蹤，至追蹤事項結束。變更正式使用後，如確認為永久變更，其相關作業管制標準書，應於三個月內修改完成，並實施教育訓練，並記錄存查。
Monitor change progress, monitor change status, track changes until closure. If there is an item that needs to be tracked, it needs to be decided by an internal meeting; a dedicated person must be assigned to be responsible for the implementation and tracking by the project manager until the end of the tracking event. After the change is official implemented, if it is confirmed as a permanent change, the relevant operation control standard shall be revised and completed within 3 months, and education and training shall be implemented, and records shall be kept for inspection.
5.7 完成變更後通知Notification after completion of changes
以上相關作業均已完成後，應以E-mail或其他適當的方式通知予資產擁有者作為正式通知。
After the aforementioned operations have been completed, the asset owner shall be formally notified via e-mail or any other appropriates means of communication.

2. 適用範圍Scope of Application
本實驗室所提供工業自動化與控制系統之專案場域相關人事物皆適用。
工業自動化與控制系統資訊安全標準IEC 62443-2-4中12項安全計畫(Security Programs, SP)規範事項涵蓋範圍如下：
This policy is applicable to all personnel, events, and objects related to industrial automation and control system projects provided by the Lab.
The scope of the 12 Security Program (SP) requirements in the accordance with IEC 62443-2-4 is as follows:
2.1 人員安全管理政策與執行
Personnel Safety Management Policy and Implementation

2.3 場域安全架構設計與執行

Network Communication Security Design and Implementation

Configuration Management and Execution

Cyber Security Incident Management and Execution
2.9 帳戶管理與執行
Account Management and Execution
2.10 惡意程式防護管理與執行
Malware Protection Management and Execution

3. 權責Roles and Responsibilities
本實驗室與專案場域負責執行專案之內部人員、委外服務廠商與訪客皆應遵守本政策。
The internal personnel, outsourced service providers, and visitors of the Lab and the project field who are responsible for implementing the project shall abide by this policy.

無。

5. 資訊安全目標The Targets of the Cyber Security
維護本實驗室所提供專案場域之資訊資產正常運作，防止資訊或資訊系統受未經授權之存取、使用、控制、洩漏、破壞、竄改、銷毀或其他侵害，並確保其資產之可用性、完整性與機密性，且所有專案團隊人員應共同努力達成下列目標：
In order to maintain the normal operation of information assets in the project field provided by the Lab, prevent information or information systems from unauthorized access, use, control, leakage, destruction, tampering, destruction or other infringements; and ensure the availability, integrity and confidentiality of their assets, all project team personnel shall work together to achieve the following goals:
5.1 保護本實驗室與專案場域資訊業務活動，避免未經授權的存取。
Protect the Lab and project field cyber operation activities to avoid unauthorized access.
5.2 保護本實驗室與專案場域資訊業務活動，避免未經授權的修改，確保其正確且完整。
Protect the Lab and project field cyber operation activities to avoid unauthorized modification, and ensure its correctness and completeness.
5.3 依照客戶對於工業自動化資訊安全要求，建立工業自動化資訊安全專案場域服務，進行專案場域風險管理，並依循IEC 62443-2-4需求項目落實品質管理循環(PDCA)精神，以持續改善工業自動化資訊安全管理系統之有效性。
According to the client's requirements for industrial automation cyber security, establish industrial automation cyber security services for the project field, conduct risk management for the project field, and follow the IEC 62443-2-4 requirements items to implement the spirit of the quality management cycle (Plan-Do-Check-Act cycle, PDCA) to continuously improve the effectiveness of the industrial automation cyber security management system.
5.4 辦理本實驗室與專案場域有關資訊安全教育訓練，提供單位學員資訊安全之意識與強化其對責任之認知。
Conduct cyber security education and training in the Lab and project field, and enhance the awareness of cyber security among department members while reinforcing their understanding of responsibilities.
5.5 本實驗室及專案場域有關工業自動化資訊安全業務活動的執行須符合法令或法規之要求。
The implementation of the industrial automation cyber security operation activities in the Lab and the project field must comply with the requirements of laws and regulations.
5.6 透過利害相關人及議題等要求事項，達成與資訊安全政策一致之預期。
Achieving alignment with cyber security policy expectations through stakeholder requirements and issues etc.
6. 責任Responsibilities 
6.1 管理階層應積極參與及支持資訊安全管理制度，並透過適當的標準和程序以實施本政策。
Managers shall actively participate in and support the cyber security management system and implement this policy through appropriate standards and procedures.
6.2 專案人員、委外廠商與專案相關之外部單位及人員均需依照相關安全管理程序以維護資訊安全政策。
Project personnel, subcontractors, and project-related external units and personnel must follow relevant security management procedures to maintain cyber security policies.
6.3 所有人員皆有責任報告資訊安全事件和任何已鑑別出之弱點。
All personnel are responsible for reporting cyber security incidents and any identified vulnerabilities.
6.4 任何危及資訊安全之行為，將視情節輕重追究其刑事、民事及行政責任，或依成功大學之相關規定進行懲處。
Any actions that endangers cyber security shall be investigated for criminal, civil, and administrative responsibilities depending on the severity of the case, or shall be punished according to the relevant regulations of NCKU.
7. 審查Review

This policy shall be reviewed at least once a year to reflect the latest developments in government laws, technology, and business, and to ensure the sustainable operation of the school and the capability of industrial automation and control system cyber security practices.
7.2 當專案團隊或專案發生重大改變時應主動進行審查。
This policy shall be actively reviewed when the project team or project undergoes significant changes.
8. 實施Implementation

This policy and its revisions shall be implemented after being reviewed by the project team.

1. 目的Purpose
為促進國立成功大學資訊與機電整合實驗室（以下稱本實驗室）資訊安全管理制度執行，以有效性之組織架構達成既定之目標，增進業務運作之安全，特制定本程序書。
To promote the implementation of the cyber security management system at the National Cheng Kung University Information and Mechatronics Integration Lab (hereinafter referred to as "the Lab"), and to achieve the established objectives of effectiveness in the organizational structure, and enhance the security of business operations, this process is hereby established.
2. 適用範圍Scope of Application
本實驗室與專案場域。
The Lab and the project field.
3. 權責Roles and Responsibilities 
3.1 計畫主持人：外部溝通、專案稽核與核可、人員指派。
Project principal: External communication, project audit and approval, personnel assignment.

Project manager: Supervision, internal and external communication, schedule planning, risk assessment, account management.
3.3 行政專員：內外部溝通、執行行政事務、人事管理事務、教育訓練召集。
Administrative commissioner: Internal and external communication, executive administrative affairs, personnel management affairs, the convening of education and training.
3.4 軟體單位：技術開發、程式修補、專案進度規劃。
Software department: Technology development, patch the program, project schedule planning.
3.5 測試單位：專案進度規劃、軟體測試、報告測試結果。
Testing department: Project schedule planning, software testing, reporting of test results.

(2) 制定資訊安全管理相關規範。
Formulate relevant specifications for cyber security management.
(3) 辦理資訊安全相關教育訓練及活動。
Conduct cyber security-related education, training and activities.

Establish a risk management system and implement risk management.
(5) 建立安全事件緊急應變暨復原措施。
Establish emergency response and recovery measures for security incidents.
(6) 執行稽核改善建議事項。
Implement audit improvement recommendations.
(7) 執行預防措施之改善。
Implementation of preventive measures for improvement.
(8) 研討新資訊安全產品或技術。
Discuss new cyber security products or technologies.
(9) 執行資訊安全管理委員會決議事項。
Implement the resolutions of the Cyber Security Management Committee.

Identify laws and regulations related to cyber security.

The Cyber Security Team shall identify the requirements of relevant laws, regulations and contracts for cyber security pertaining to the cyber services provided by the Lab before holding the management review meeting every year.

	Emergency Response Team Leader:

Responsible for early warning and monitoring of cyber security status and handling of cyber security incidents.。

Responsible for assembling relevant personnel and for developing, maintaining, updating, revising and implementing various disaster recovery procedures.

Responsible for annually organize testing exercises for business continuity operations involving relevant personnel.
